title: No Financial Documentation is required to borrow money
info: Contrary to the traditional financial institutes like Banks, Fixed deposits, etc., UmaChitFund allows the participants to borrow a loan instantly without any need for documentation

title: Higher Return on Investment (ROI)
info: Compared to the traditional indigenous sources of income, UmaChitFund is a high-yielding community-based monetary setup, generating passive income for its participants in the form of dividends accumulated from Chit Events.

title: Extensive and Protracted Savings
info: Participants who don’t need money can just sit back and enjoy dividends from every chit round, and receive the entire pot amou

title: Perpetual Profit Cycle
info: The Pot money (borrowed amount) from the Chit round can also be utilized to participate in another low-range chit Event or for staking (if borrowed in UCF Token) on the platform to amplify the rewards.

title: Earning 72% APR on staked collateral
info: In addition to dividends, the participants will also receive staking rewards (72% APR) in the form of UCF every month according to the collateral amount left in the ‘Chit Pool’ after deduction of every month’s EMI.
